property.name: fs.default.name
property.description: The name of the default file system. A URI whose scheme and authority determine the FileSystem implementation. The uri's scheme determines the config property (fs.SCHEME.impl) naming the FileSystem implementation class. The uri's authority is used to determine the host, port, etc. for a filesystem.

property.name: dfs.http.address
property.description: The address and the base port where the dfs namenode web ui will listen on. If the port is 0 then the server will start on a free port.

property.name: mapred.job.tracker
property.description: The host and port that the MapReduce job tracker runs at. If "local", then jobs are run in-process as a single map and reduce task.
